name: Crescent Cutlass
text:
Main If there is a Character with a cost of 0 or a Character with a cost of 8 or more, all of your Characters with a type including "Baroque Works" gain +3 cost until the end of your opponent's next turn. 
Counter Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

effect.text: If there is a Character with a cost of 0 or a Character with a cost of 8 or more, all of your Characters with a type including "Baroque Works" gain +3 cost until the end of your opponent's next turn.
conditions: there is a Character with a cost of 0
